name: Trolls
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trolls
Developer Terms of Use
des: Poppy and Tiny Diamond need a song for their party, and they want YOU to create it. But to make your music, you’ll need to visit one of three incredible Trolls musical lands—Pop, Rock, or Country. Build the song one way, and then you change it until your toe-tapping melody is just the way you want it before you reveal it for all of Troll Village. Save your songs and play them back later for your friends and family.
